summary: Elysea CME save from my follower mod "Elysea Standalone Follower"
descriptionHtml:
[center]
Here is the saved preset used for my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69421?]Elysea Standalone Follower - UNPB-BBP[/url]

[u][b][color=#ffff00][font=Tahoma][size=5]Requirements:[/size][/font][/color][/b][/u]


[size=3]- Skyrim version 1.9.32.0 or higher[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] – By ECE Team (tktk1)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHairFemale[/url] – By apachii (download the last common version AND the ApachiiSkyHairFemale pack ! The SkyHairFemale pack have to be load [u]before[/u] the common version)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url] – By LogRaam
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url] – By hellosanta
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] – By hellosanta
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP BLESSED BODY – UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url]– By Blessed Redux Project Team (Xp32)

[b][size=3][u]Without their great works, nothing that I done would have been possible, many thanks again to all of them ![/u][/size][/b]

[u][b][color=#ffff00][font=Tahoma][size=5]Recommendations:[/size][/font][/color][/b][/u]

Face Light – By tktk
Female Facial Animation – By nao4288
Smile in HD - By zzjay

[b][u][size=5][font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00]Installation:[/color][/font]

[/size][/u][/b]- Download the CME save & copy/paste the commonTriRace.slot file into Your Documents/My Games/Skyrim/CME_save
- Start the game, launch the Showracemenu command and load the slot corresponding

[size=4][b]/!\[/b][/size] [u][i]A Suggestion? A question ? A bug maybe ? Or even a simple commentary, leave a message in the comment section unless if you're a
modder and have a special request/question, then leave me a private message[/i][/u] [size=4][b]/!\

[/b][/size][font=Tahoma][color=#ff0000][size=5]Please [/size][b][u][size=6]endorse[/size][/u][/b][size=5] if you like this mod ! This will encourage me to make more mods or improving this one ![/size][/color]

[/font][b][u][size=5][font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00]My others follower mods:[/color][/font]
[/size][/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69421?]Elysea Standalone Follower - UNPB-BBP[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69473?]Sophia Standalone Follower - UNP-UNPB-BBP
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69487/?]Sophia CME save[/url][/center]
author: dadanexus
